alert.note: Alert for Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 09 at 8:40PM EST until February 12 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky... Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at Shawneetown, Mount Vernon, and Newburgh Dam. .Recent precipitation has caused the Ohio River to rise modestly this week. Several locations on the Ohio River will rise, crest, then fall below minor flood stage later this weekend. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 36.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 37.6 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
